description: Approval of details including:- landscaping, lighting, new gates to Cloudesley Street entrance, modification of existing gates onto Cloudesley Square, soil investigation, engineering survey of boundary walls, boundary treatement, sound insulation to south arch (soffitt), facing materials, hard surfacing (including retention of cobbles),  pursuant to conditions on planning permission 93/0365 granted on lst September 1994 and 10th October 1994.  The following conditions refer:- 01, 02 of 93/0366 and 02,04,06,07,08,09,10,11,12 and 13 of 93/0365.  Facing materials are Ockley Smead Dean London Stock, Redland Smooth Buff and tarmac Rebastone Portland. Applicant's Plan Nos. P1A, P13A, P15, P16A-P21A, P26,P27, P28A-P31A, P8C, CP,DLL,01 Rev.B.  Letters 17.02.95 refers. 05.05.95 refers. 21.02.95 refers.
